articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.title: Cathay Pacific is asking employees to take unpaid leave as coronavirus causes travel to plummet
articles.description: 27,000 employees pushed to take three weeks off.

articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: The Gates Foundation is pledging up to $100 million for the fight against coronavirus
articles.description: The $100 million total includes $10 million that the philanthropic organization already dedicated to coronavirus containment efforts in January.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Beijing bans birthday parties and other get-togethers to curb coronavirus spread
articles.description: Restaurants and caterers are not allowed to serve groups of people and should cancel or postpone any such events immediatel.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: Patient or prisoner? Governments deploy surveillance tech to track coronavirus victims

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: Global markets roar back—too soon to call this the ‘coronavirus comeback’?
articles.description: Tuesday's rally in the Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq have extended overseas with investors nearly reversing all losses incurred by the coronavirus outbreak. Can it last?

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: China wants to patent Gilead’s promising coronavirus treatment
articles.description: Gilead’s experimental drug is entering clinical trials in China on patients with the Wuhan virus.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: 10 passengers with coronavirus turn Princess cruise ship into a floating quarantine
articles.description: Even passengers who test negative for the deadly Wuhan virus must stay aboard for 14 days.
